title: nf-cmgg/sampletracking pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

pool.errorMessage: Pool name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

sample_bam.errorMessage: Sample BAM/CRAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam' or '.cram'

sample_bam_index.errorMessage: Sample BAM/CRAM index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bai' or '.csi'

snp_fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

snp_fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

snp_bam.errorMessage: snp BAM/CRAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam' or '.cram'

snp_bam_index.errorMessage: snp BAM/CRAM index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bai' or '.csi'

sex.errorMessage: The value should be one of 'M' (male), 'F' (female) or 'U' (unknown)
